short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste Bible references easily.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Bible Tool is a Chrome extension designed for everyone who cherishes the Bible - from casual readers to devout scholars. With just a click, access scripture and copy the verse for referencing all within the comfort of your browser.

Key Features
- Search any Bible Verses from over 5 different Bible Translations
- With a Click of a Button Copy the Verse to your Clipboard
- Fetch more than 1 Verse at a Single Time

We have over 8 different supported Bible Version across multiple languages, and more to come!
